attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Only English, Welsh and native languages to be spoken in schools and supported by local governments. No more multi lingual leaflets and interpreters.
Live in UK speaka da English!!!

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Keep Britain British."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11995.asp

Prime Minister's Office
